import React from "react"; const LandingPage = () => { return (

Condiment Pen

The Condiment Pen is a convenient and mess-free way to dispense your favorite condiments. Perfect for use at home or on-the-go, the Condiment Pen allows you to add a pop of flavor to your food without the mess.

Customer Testimonials

"The Condiment Pen has changed the way I enjoy my sandwiches! No more soggy bread or messy dispensing." - John Doe
"I love being able to take my favorite condiments with me wherever I go. The Condiment Pen is a game-changer!" - Jane Doe

Replacement Condiment Inserts

Choose from packs of 10 or 20 replacement condiment inserts to keep your Condiment Pen filled with your favorite flavors.

Shipping Information

We offer free shipping on all orders over $50. Delivery times may vary based on your location.

); }; export default LandingPage;
